name: Boxing Champions: Robot Steel
description:
Get ready to fight in the ring as fighter robots ,just choose your mech robot and opponent to start battle!The Super Hero robot fighting game of the future is here! The futuristic grand robots were build and trained to protect the world, but now the artificial battle robot fighters are amid on breaking havoc. Take down the ultimate robot warfare, with its robot boxing and street fighting skills.Brace yourself and get ready to show case your fighting styles against the grand futuristic robot as you face them in the battle arena.

-Superhero Fighting game
-Realistic modern fighter robots
-Ultimate steel boxing ring environments
-Advance Robot Battle Moves to Knock Out the Opponent
-Extreme survival mission levels
-Ultimate Robot Simulator Fighting Championship
